the Legislature could start impeachment proceedings asas Monday , and the Illinois Supreme Court could act on a request by Attorney General Lisa Madigan to strip him of his powers .立法机关可以开始弹劾程序尽快周一，伊利诺斯州最高法院可能会采取行动，要求总检察长丽莎根剥夺了他的权力。
